comment: Matthew will want the European American working class to pay for feeding, clothing and educating every refugee child who comes to the United States.
amr:
# ::snt Matthew will want the European American working class to pay for feeding, clothing and educating every refugee child who comes to the United States.
(w / want-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Matthew"))
      :ARG1 (p2 / pay-01
            :ARG0 (c / class
                  :ARG0-of (w2 / work-01)
                  :mod (c2 / continent
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Europe"))
                  :mod (c3 / country
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "America")))
            :ARG3 (a / and
                  :op1 (f / feed-01
                        :ARG2 (c4 / child
                              :mod (r / refugee)
                              :mod (e / every)
                              :ARG1-of (c5 / come-01
                                    :ARG4 (c6 / country
                                          :name (n4 / name
                                                :op1 "United"
                                                :op2 "States")))))
                  :op2 (c7 / clothe-01
                        :ARG1 c4)
                  :op3 (e2 / educate-01
                        :ARG1 c4))))
